dcterms:creator: N. Sunderhauf
P. Neubert
P. Protzel
dcterms:description: The Nordland dataset captures a 728 km train journey in Norway where the same traverse is recorded during spring, summer, fall, and winter. The dataset is used for evaluating visual place recognition systems.
dcterms:title: Nordland

dcterms:creator: W. Maddern
G. Pascoe
C. Linegar
P. Newman
dcterms:description: The Oxford RobotCar dataset contains over 100 traversals captured under varying weather conditions, times of the day, and seasons. It is used for evaluating visual place recognition systems.
dcterms:title: Oxford RobotCar
